syntax.GenericSyntaxError: A syntax error occurred in your Python code.
syntax.IndentationError: Incorrect indentation. Python uses indentation to define code blocks.
syntax.MissingInitializerInVariableDeclaration: Missing initializer in variable declaration. You must provide a value when declaring a variable.
syntax.ParseError: Parse error in Python code syntax.
syntax.UnexpectedIndentation: Unexpected indentation found. Check your code structure.
syntax.UnimplementedToken: The '{{lexeme}}' feature is not yet implemented.
syntax.UnterminatedComment: Unterminated comment. Multi-line comments must be properly closed.
syntax.UnterminatedString: Unterminated string literal. Make sure to close your string quotes.
syntax.MissingParameterName: Missing parameter name in function definition.
syntax.DuplicateParameterName: Duplicate parameter name '{{name}}' in function definition.
syntax.MissingRightParenthesisAfterFunctionCall: Did you forget the closing parenthesis ')' when calling the {{function}} function?

runtime.IndexError: List index {{index}} is out of range.
runtime.InvalidBinaryExpression: Invalid binary operation '{{operator}}' is not supported.
runtime.InvalidUnaryExpression: Invalid unary operation '{{operator}}' is not supported.
runtime.NodeNotAllowed: {{nodeType}} is not allowed at this level.
runtime.ReturnOutsideFunction: Return statement cannot be used outside of a function.
runtime.TruthinessDisabled: Cannot use {{value}} as a boolean value. Only boolean values are allowed in conditions when truthiness is disabled.
runtime.TypeCoercionNotAllowed: Type coercion is not allowed for operator '{{operator}}': {{details}}.
runtime.MethodNotYetImplemented: The method '{{method}}' is not yet implemented.
runtime.MethodNotYetAvailable: The method '{{method}}' is not yet available.
runtime.MaxIterationsReached: Your code ran for too long and was stopped to prevent an infinite loop. The maximum number of iterations allowed is {{max}}.
